pUqrNA paqScAduqta pUqrNA puqrastAqdun-ma#ddhyaqtaH pau$rNamAqsI ji#gAya | 
tasyA$n dEqvA adhi# saqM~Mvasa#nta uttaqmE nAka# iqha mA#dayantAM || 
yattE# dEqvA ada#dhu rBAgaqdhEyaqmamA#vAsyE saqM~Mvasa#ntO mahiqtvA | 
sAnO# yaqj~jaM pi#pRuhi viSvavArE raqyiM nO# dhEhi suBagE suqvIra$M ||
niqvESa#nI saq~ggama#nIq vasU#nAqM ~MviSvA# rUqpANiq vasU$nyAvEqSaya#ntI | 
saqhaqsraqpOqSha(gm) suqBagAq rarA#NAq sA naq Agaqn. varca#sA - [  ]   1
